greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 3*a(n-1) - 3*a(n-2) + a(n-3) - a(n-4), n>=4;  a(0) = 1, a(1) = 1, a(2) = 2, a(3) = 3.
comment: The Ze1 sums, see A180662, of triangle A108299 equal the terms of this sequence.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1,-1).
maple: A193885 := proc(n) option remember: if n=0 then 1 elif n=1 then 1 elif n=2 then 2 elif n=3 then 3 elif n>=4 then 3*procname(n-1)-3*procname(n-2)+procname(n-3)-procname(n-4) fi: end: seq(A193885(n),n=0..37);
program: (MAGMA)I:=[1, 1, 2, 3 ]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 3*Self(n-1)-3*Self(n-2)+Self(n-3)-Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 10 2012
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 11 2011
